definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
see 謎兒|谜儿[mei4 r5], riddle

sentences.english: Find the first clue unraveling the mystery.
sentences.chinese: 找到了第一条解谜的线索。

sentences.english: It is a first-person horror game, heavily focused on puzzle solving.
sentences.chinese: 这是一款第一人称惊悚游戏，严重专注于解谜要素。

sentences.english: The clues to solving them are all around, hidden in plain sight.
sentences.chinese: 解谜的线索到处都是，藏在我们能够一览无遗的地方。

sentences.english: Find the final clue unraveling the mystery, alone or with another ODST.
sentences.chinese: 单人或跟队友找到了最后一条解谜的线索。

sentences.english: And if you would know God be not therefore a solver of riddles .
sentences.chinese: 而假如你们愿意了解上帝就不要因此成为一个解谜者。

sentences.english: Find the 3rd clue unraveling the mystery, alone or with another ODST.
sentences.chinese: 单人或跟队友找到了第三条解谜的线索。

sentences.english: Find out in this heart-pounding hidden-object puzzle adventure.
sentences.chinese: 请在这场扣人心弦的解谜冒险中找到答案。

sentences.english: This is a classic Unblock game.
sentences.chinese: 一款经典的障碍解谜游戏。

sentences.english: And if you would know God be not therefore a solver of riddles.
sentences.chinese: 如果你们想认识上帝，那就不要去做解谜者。

pinyin: jue2 se4 ban4 yan3 you2 xi4

definition: to play fast and loose with the law/to game the system/(leisure) rules of the game/way of doing an activity/(tourism) way of experiencing a place
science fiction/abbr. for 科學幻想|科学幻想[ke1 xue2 huan4 xiang3]
